Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility assessment and internal flight alternative (IFA)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Found applicant not credible due to inconsistencies in testimony
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Persecution based on sexual orientation in Nigeria
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Credibility and existence of internal flight alternative
Crimes.Application_Error: Overreliance on minor inconsistencies, failure to consider explanations
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Presumption of truth in refugee testimony unless rebutted
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false documents and discretion about sexuality
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of credibility and IFA findings
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Rule: Credibility assessed under reasonableness; IFA cannot require concealment of immutable characteristics
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Perceived lack of credibility and alleged viable IFA in Lagos
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in story and document discrepancies
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Failure to adequately assess credibility and IFA

Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Insufficient reasoning on credibility and IFA

Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Questioned due to use of false French passport
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution based on homosexuality in Nigeria

Crimes.Application_Error: Unreasonable focus on false passport without considering context

Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false French passport to enter Canada
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of credibility and IFA findings
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Rule: Possession of false passport does not automatically negate credibility
